title: Call Summary - Generic Prompt
author: Raveena Khan, Sriparna Banerjee
description:
Call Summary - Generic
This is a generic prompt adaptable with any LLM that provides crisp & accurate summary of the conversation between customer & operator. ReAct style of prompting is used that provides summary with all the important information intact and removing redundant information & filler words. This prompt can be used to generate summary for any kind of information.
